review: Fits perfectly. Exactly like the image and original product.
After used of months is still in good condition. in this price you can go for it no color faded in months

Good stuff very comfortable and light weight No discount on amazon for this But still I would say a great buy only for the quality product that amazon has brought to our doorstep Thanks amazon for it 😊

review_title: Good color with🙂 Design & do not attract the dirt
review: Good pair of slippers while  maintaining a good friction & air flow between feett 👣 due to the soft non painful dotted structure. Also recommended for those whose feet are sweaty ☺️.Mine are...a medium bit. These also get wet easily 😭⛅ but tilt them they drain also very fast...Thanks Hit the thumb's up if u like the explanation.

The strap is wide, so it could feel a bit snug fit, but the size is correct as advertised. If you like lose straps, go for a size bigger maybe. It is only temporary feeling, and the person gets used to it in a day, so I'd suggest go for your correct size. And the texture of the surface feels awesome to the feet. This is my 4th purchase, same chappal, but different sizes for people in the house. Everyone loves it.

This slippers only suitable for outdoors...indoors not suitable as it's highly slippery...in bathroom don't even think off. The bottom covering or soul is very cheap looking bn is not at all expected from.such a brand company.very bad.

These are very flexible, made of soft rubber and have good grip with very good levels of comfort and has that very slightly spongy/spring effect when you wear them. Not only that these Look Good, they are Nice enough to wear casually anywhere you need. It's a must buy for the price they come in 👍

review_title: Bahamas by Bata, the 2nd amazing slipper purchase that hasn't disappointed me
review: 15 days review of the product Pros • The overall durability and feel of the product in your leg is good for light to medium level usage. • The orange and grey color used for it's strap and legs base is bright and pastel like. • Doesn't wear even if drenched in water. Cons • The bright orange and green colors were the only option available. Even though they look bright and pleasing to the eyes when clean, getting is messy and having stains on it is extremely extremely easy. • Has white stains on the darker colors of the slippers when wet which could be attributed to the water's quality but still needs to be mentioned.

pehle humara beta .... humari baat nahi sunta tha..... din raat apne nikamme doston ke saath pada rehta tha ... phir ekdin humari bai ne iss chappal ke bareme bataya ...... phir kya humne order kar diya..... abb humara beta humare saari baatein sunta hai........... main isko recommend karta hoon ye sasta tikao hai ....ye chappal sirf pehen ne ke hi kaam nhi aata ...isse aap aur bhi bohot kuch kar sakte ho..... ...... (joke tha ye BTW i really like this product..... )

Everything is just so perfect in this price range that it deserves 5/5, but I gave 4/5 only because it is slightly small for its size. Order one size up (order 8 if your size is 7). Otherwise it is perfect buy. Will purchase again. Well recommended.
